mapper.select: select row_noticeNum, notice_num, notice_title, notice_area1, notice_area2, notice_career FROM(select row_noticeNum, notice_num, notice_title, notice_area1, notice_area2, notice_career FROM(select row_number() over(order by notice_num desc) as row_noticeNum , notice_num, notice_title, notice_area1 , notice_area2, notice_career FROM notice_tb order by notice_num desc) a where row_noticeNum<= (#{pageNum} * #{amount}) )aa where row_noticeNum > (#{pageNum}-1)* #{amount}
